channel.title: Red Flare

item.title: British Neo-Nazis Given Bundestag Tour by German Far-Right AfD MP
item.description: Members of the Homeland Party, a British fascist party that split from Patriotic Alternative, were invited to the German Bundestag. The delegation included figures with links to individuals jailed for neo-Nazi terrorism offences.

item.title: Neo-Nazi who Posted Arson Threats is in Private Chats of Patriotic Alternative

item.title: Things to Consider When Evaluating Far-Right Threats
item.description: Over the past week we have seen social media users spreading rumours and speculation about far-right protests without any corroborating evidence.

item.title: Neo-Nazis Call for Arson Attacks on Immigration-related Charities, Advice Centres and Solicitors
item.description: A far-right Telegram group with 13,000 members is sharing a list of 39 immigration-related charities, advice centres and solicitors as targets for arson attacks on Wednesday night.

item.title: Convicted Neo-Nazi Terrorist was at Southport Riot
item.description: One of the far-right activists who travelled to Southport on Tuesday night was Matthew Hankinson, an unrepentant neo-Nazi terrorist, who was jailed for six years for his membership of the proscribed neo-Nazi youth group National Action.
